code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic [3:0] in,
    output logic out_and,
    output logic out_or,
    output logic out_xor
);

    always @(*) begin
        out_and = in[0] & in[1] & in[2] & in[3]; // 1'b0 & 1'b0 & 1'b0 & 1'b0
        out_or  = in[0] | in[1] | in[2] | in[3]; // 1'b1 | 1'b1 | 1'b1 | 1'b1
        out_xor = in[0] ^ in[1] ^ in[2] ^ in[3]; // 1'b1 ^ 1'b1 ^ 1'b1 ^ 1'b1
    end

endmodule
[DONE]

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
